title: Legitimate reasoning (From the best player on GD) of why assassins shouldn't be buffed
body:
1. They are made for new players to play and have fun with (hence why they're all slightly op, noobs need the handicap) 

2. Their kits take zero mechanics to execute, all you do is press R and Q the majority of the time

3. They ruin the balance of ARAM 

4. They are very anti-fun to play against

5. Most of the champions are just dumbed-down designs of previous heros, for instance Rengar being a dumbed down AD version of annie, etc.

please stop circlejerking assassins
